actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to delay for six months the effective date of the increase in the hospital deductible for 1978 under part A of the medicare program.

summary.text: Delays for six months the effective date of the increase in the hospital deductible for 1978 under the hospital insurance program of Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to delay for six months the effective date of the increase in the hospital deductible for 1978 under part A of the medicare program.
